member.summary: Viirus is found, and may be cleaned.

member.summary: Scan the specified file, and clean if infected.

member.summary: Get or set the client GUID of this scannerr.

member.name: T:AntiVirus.COMInterop.ATTACHMENT_PROMPT
member.summary: Provides a set of flags to be used with IAttachmentExecute::Prompt to indicate the type of prompt UI to display.

member.name: F:AntiVirus.COMInterop.ATTACHMENT_PROMPT.ATTACHMENT_PROMPT_NONE
member.summary: Do not use.

member.name: F:AntiVirus.COMInterop.ATTACHMENT_PROMPT.ATTACHMENT_PROMPT_SAVE
member.summary: Displays a prompt asking whether the user would like to save the attachment.

member.name: F:AntiVirus.COMInterop.ATTACHMENT_PROMPT.ATTACHMENT_PROMPT_EXEC
member.summary: Displays a prompt asking whether the user would like to execute the attachment.

member.name: F:AntiVirus.COMInterop.ATTACHMENT_PROMPT.ATTACHMENT_PROMPT_EXEC_OR_SAVE
member.summary: Displays a prompt giving the user a choice of executing or saving the attachment.

member.name: T:AntiVirus.COMInterop.ATTACHMENT_ACTION
member.summary: Provides a set of flags to be used with IAttachmentExecute::Prompt to indicate the action to be performed upon user confirmation.

member.name: F:AntiVirus.COMInterop.ATTACHMENT_ACTION.ATTACHMENT_ACTION_CANCEL
member.summary: Cancel

member.name: F:AntiVirus.COMInterop.ATTACHMENT_ACTION.ATTACHMENT_ACTION_SAVE
member.summary: Save

member.name: F:AntiVirus.COMInterop.ATTACHMENT_ACTION.ATTACHMENT_ACTION_EXEC
member.summary: Execute

member.name: T:AntiVirus.COMInterop.IAttachmentExecute
member.summary: Exposes methods that work with client applications to present a user environment that provides safe download and exchange of files through email and messaging attachments.

member.name: M:AntiVirus.COMInterop.IAttachmentExecute.SetClientTitle(System.String)
member.summary: Specifies and stores the title of the prompt window.
member.param: A string that contains the title text.

member.name: M:AntiVirus.COMInterop.IAttachmentExecute.SetClientGuid(System.Guid@)
member.summary: Specifies and stores the GUID for the client.
member.param: The GUID that represents the client.

member.name: M:AntiVirus.COMInterop.IAttachmentExecute.SetLocalPath(System.String)
member.summary: A string that contains the file name.
member.param: A string that contains the local path where the attachment file is to be stored.

member.name: M:AntiVirus.COMInterop.IAttachmentExecute.SetFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Specifies and stores the proposed name of the file.
member.param: A string that contains the file name.

member.name: M:AntiVirus.COMInterop.IAttachmentExecute.SetSource(System.String)
member.summary: Sets an alternate path or URL for the source of a file transfer.
member.param: A string containing the path or URL to use as the source.

member.name: M:AntiVirus.COMInterop.IAttachmentExecute.SetReferrer(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the security zone associated with the attachment file based on the referring file.
member.param: A string containing the path of the referring file.

member.name: M:AntiVirus.COMInterop.IAttachmentExecute.CheckPolicy
member.summary: Provides a Boolean test that can be used to make decisions based on the attachment's execution policy.
member.returns: S_OK meaning Enable, S_FALSE meaning Prompt, Any other failure code meaning Disable.

member.name: M:AntiVirus.COMInterop.IAttachmentExecute.Prompt(System.IntPtr,AntiVirus.COMInterop.ATTACHMENT_PROMPT)
member.summary: Presents a prompt UI to the user.
member.param: A handle to the parent window.
A member of the ATTACHMENT_PROMPT enumeration that indicates what type of prompt UI to display to the user.
member.returns: A member of the ATTACHMENT_ACTION enumeration that indicates the action to be performed upon user confirmation.

member.name: M:AntiVirus.COMInterop.IAttachmentExecute.Save
member.summary: A member of the ATTACHMENT_ACTION enumeration that indicates the action to be performed upon user confirmation.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: M:AntiVirus.COMInterop.IAttachmentExecute.Execute(System.IntPtr,System.String,System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: Executes an action on an attachment.
member.param: The handle of the parent window.
A string that contains a verb specifying the action to be performed on the file. See the lpOperation parameter in ShellExecute for valid strings. This value can be NULL.
A pointer to a handle to the source process, used for synchronous operation. This value can be NULL.

member.name: M:AntiVirus.COMInterop.IAttachmentExecute.SaveWithUI(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Presents the user with explanatory error UI if the save action fails.
member.param: The handle of the parent window.

member.name: M:AntiVirus.COMInterop.IAttachmentExecute.ClearClientState
member.summary: Removes any stored state that is based on the client's GUID. An example might be a setting based on a checked box that indicates a prompt should not be displayed again for a particular file type.
